g++   -g -Wall -Wextra -Werror -Wconversion -Wno-unused-parameter -Wold-style-cast -Woverloaded-virtual -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wwrite-strings -march=native -std=c++11 -rdynamic -O0   CMakeFiles/simple_daytime.dir/src/daytime.cc.o CMakeFiles/simple_daytime.dir/src/main.cc.o  -o bin/simple_daytime -rdynamic /home/build/release-install-cpp11/lib/libmuduo_net.a /home/build/release-install-cpp11/lib/libmuduo_base.a -lpthread -lrt
